autoComplete.description: The autocomplete attribute for the password input.

defaultVisible.description: The default visibility of the password input.

disabled.description: Whether the password input is disabled.

ids.description: The ids of the password input parts

ignorePasswordManagers.description:
When `true`, the input will ignore password managers.

**Only works for the following password managers**
- 1Password, LastPass, Bitwarden, Dashlane, Proton Pass

invalid.description: The invalid state of the password input.

name.description: The name of the password input.

onVisibilityChange.description: Function called when the visibility changes.

readOnly.description: Whether the password input is read only.

required.description: Whether the password input is required.

visible.description: Whether the password input is visible.
